name: I'm Tom Swifty The VIII, I Am. Quiz / Test | Brain Teasers | 10 Questions

questions.text:
EXAMPLE: "I like camping," said Tom ___.  The answer is INTENTLY. 

Note: The spellings are always correct American English, although the pronunciation may not be. The hint will tell the number of words and letters.  Also the beginning and last letters IE: S/LY or S/D.  There are no periods after any of the answers...sorry for the error in a previous quiz.


QUESTION ONE: "Pass me the knife," Tom said ___.

questions.explanation:
Abstractly.

	Abstract painting is a modern innovation.

questions.text: "I decided which car to purchase after looking at the pictures," Tom said ___.
questions.explanation:
Autobiographically.

	Car = Auto, purchase = buy, pictures = graphics.

questions.text: "I can't believe you set off the ___!" Tom said explosively.
"I'm swimming in the middle of Paris!" Tom said ___.
questions.explanation:
Insanely.

	Swimming in the middle of Paris?  In Seine.

questions.text: "It's covered in gold leaf," Tom said ___.
"It's the butler's night off," Tom said ___.

questions.explanation:
Stereo.

	Half a stereo would be MONO.

questions.text:
"_____," Tom said ___. 
(The second underscore is what you are to fill in.)
questions.explanation:
Blankly.

	Does this Really require an explanation?

questions.text: "I'm still looking for my beagle," Tom said ___.
questions.explanation:
Doggedly.

	Kind of obvious when you see it, no?
